original: @##/_/bcom ldan 'das mi bskyod pa la phyag 'tshhal lo/_/sgrub po
analyzed: @##/_/bcom ldan 'das mi bskyod pa la phyag 'tshhal lo/_/sgrub po

original: dam tshhig ldan pa yis/_/dgon pa'am grong mtha' la sogs par/_/khrus byas
analyzed: dam tshhig ldan pa yis/_/dgon pa'am grong mtha' la sogs par/_/khrus byas
translated: endowed with the commitments, in a solitary place, at the edge of a town, and so on,🔽having performed ablutions,🔽having done everything,

original: gtshang mar byas pa yis/_/las byas bde ba'i stan la 'dug_/rang lhar
analyzed: gtshang mar byas pa yis/_/las byas bde ba'i stan la 'dug_/rang lhar
translated: sits on a comfortable seat.🔽In the heart of the clear deity,🔽on a lotus and moon, is a hūṃ.

original: gsal ba'i thugs ka ru/_/pad+ma zla ba'i steng du hum/_/de las 'od zer 'phros
analyzed: gsal ba'i thugs ka ru/_/pad+ma zla ba'i steng du hum/_/de las 'od zer 'phros
translated: From that, light radiates

original: pa yis/_/bla ma dang ni mi bskyod pa/_/spyan drangs mdun du bzhugs pa la/_/
analyzed: pa yis/_/bla ma dang ni mi bskyod pa/_/spyan drangs mdun du bzhugs pa la/_/
translated: and invites the guru and Akṣobhya, who sit in front.

original: bdun po rnam par dag pa bya/_/tshhad med bzhi dang ldan par ni/_/chos
analyzed: bdun po rnam par dag pa bya/_/tshhad med bzhi dang ldan par ni/_/chos
translated: The seven limbs are performed, and🔽all phenomena are meditated on as unreal

original: rnams thams cad dngos med par/_/sems kyis bsgom par byas nas ni/_/
analyzed: rnams thams cad dngos med par/_/sems kyis bsgom par byas nas ni/_/
translated: with the four immeasurables.🔽Think of a moon maṇḍala from a,

original: a las zla ba'i dkyil 'khor bsam/_/rang gi sa bon de dbus su/_/bsams
analyzed: a las zla ba'i dkyil 'khor bsam/_/rang gi sa bon de dbus su/_/bsams
translated: and in its center, think of one’s seed syllable,🔽and form the pledge mudra.

original: nas dam tshhig phyag rgya bca'/_/de nas rang gi sa bon dang /_/phyag mtshhan
analyzed: nas dam tshhig phyag rgya bca'/_/de nas rang gi sa bon dang /_/phyag mtshhan
translated: Then, from one’s seed syllable and hand implement,

original: phyag rgya de byin brlab/_/de rnams gyur pas mi 'khrugs pa/_/zhal gcig phyag
analyzed: phyag rgya de byin brlab/_/de rnams gyur pas mi 'khrugs pa/_/zhal gcig phyag
translated: Consecrate the seal, and by its transformation, meditate on Akṣobhya,🔽with one face and two arms, his body blue,

original: gnyis sku mdog sngo/_/g.yon pa pang gzhag rdo rje dang /_/g.yas pas sa
analyzed: gnyis sku mdog sngo/_/g.yon pa pang gzhag rdo rje dang /_/g.yas pas sa
translated: his left hand resting in his lap holding a vajra,🔽and his right hand in a threatening gesture.🔽The buddhas confer empowerment in stages,

original: gnon tshhul can bsgom/_/ltag 'og rim pa ji bzhin du/_/sangs rgyas rnams🔽kyis dbang bskur ro/_/rang nyid rang lhar bsgoms la ni/_/mi 'khrugs
analyzed: gnon tshhul can bsgom/_/ltag 'og rim pa ji bzhin du/_/sangs rgyas rnams kyis dbang bskur ro/_/rang nyid rang lhar bsgoms la ni/_/mi 'khrugs
translated: one after the other.🔽Meditate on yourself as the deity,🔽and visualize Akṣobhya in front or above your head.

original: mdun nam spyi bor bsam/_/rang lus mi 'khrugs bsgoms la bstim/_/
analyzed: mdun nam spyi bor bsam/_/rang lus mi 'khrugs bsgoms la bstim/_/
translated: Meditate on your body as Akṣobhya and dissolve him into it.🔽From the hūṃ in the heart, on a lotus and moon,

original: thugs ka'i pad zla'i hum las ni/_/dbus su mi bskyod pa nyid bsgom/_/phyogs
analyzed: thugs ka'i pad zla'i hum las ni/_/dbus su mi bskyod pa nyid bsgom/_/phyogs
translated: meditate on Akṣobhya himself in the center,🔽and in the four directions, meditate on the four buddhas.

original: bzhir sangs rgyas bzhi bsgom bya/_/mchod dang bstod pa bzlas pa bya/_/sgra
analyzed: bzhir sangs rgyas bzhi bsgom bya/_/mchod dang bstod pa bzlas pa bya/_/sgra
translated: Make offerings, praises, and recitations,

original: dang sems dang gzhi la gzhol/_/yan lag bzhi dang dmigs pa gsum/_/
analyzed: dang sems dang gzhi la gzhol/_/yan lag bzhi dang dmigs pa gsum/_/
translated: and focus on sound, mind, and the basis.🔽The approach for the benefit of others and oneself

original: gzhan dang rang don bsnyen pa ni/_/grangs dang dus dang mtshhan ma'o/_/
analyzed: gzhan dang rang don bsnyen pa ni/_/grangs dang dus dang mtshhan ma'o/_/
translated: is in terms of number, time, and signs.

original: dngos grub bzlas pa'i rim pa ni/_/ngag dang shib bu rdo rje bzlas/_/yid de
analyzed: dngos grub bzlas pa'i rim pa ni/_/ngag dang shib bu rdo rje bzlas/_/yid de
translated: the recitation of the voice, the recitation of the vajra, the recitation of the🔽mind, and the recitation with expression.🔽The three—fire, sound, and the end of sound—

original: brjod dang bcas pa bzhi/_/me dang sgra dang sgra mthar gsum/_/thun gsum
analyzed: brjod dang bcas pa bzhi/_/me dang sgra dang sgra mthar gsum/_/thun gsum
translated: are recited in three sessions.

original: dag tu bzlas par bya/_/gnyis ni mchod bstod gtor ma sbyin/_/de ltar thun
analyzed: dag tu bzlas par bya/_/gnyis ni mchod bstod gtor ma sbyin/_/de ltar thun
translated: The two—offering and praise—are given as a torma.🔽In this way, having first thoroughly completed the approach

original: gsum sbyor ba yis/_/bsnyen pa sngon du rab song bas/_/gang 'dod dngos
analyzed: gsum sbyor ba yis/_/bsnyen pa sngon du rab song bas/_/gang 'dod dngos
translated: in the three sessions,🔽in order to accomplish the desired attainment,

original: grub bsgrub _pa'i phyir/_/de ni las la sbyar bar bya/_/pad+mo'i 'od la char chu
analyzed: grub bsgrub _pa'i phyir/_/de ni las la sbyar bar bya/_/pad+mo'i 'od la char chu
translated: one should apply it to the rite.🔽Like the light of a lotus closing with the water of rain

original: yis/_/kha zum 'od kyis 'byed pa 'am/_/nyi ma me shel me 'byung bzhin/_/
analyzed: yis/_/kha zum 'od kyis 'byed pa 'am/_/nyi ma me shel me 'byung bzhin/_/
translated: or the light of the sun opening with the water of rain,🔽the attainment is bestowed on the body of a human.

analyzed: mi yi lus la dngos grub ster/_/bdag gi dge ba'i las rnams 'di dag gis/_/
translated: By these virtuous deeds of mine,🔽may I quickly become a buddha in the world,

analyzed: 'jig rten du ni myur du sangs rgyas shog_/'gro la phan phyir chos rnams ston
